Menace
When Rastafel’s Menaces enters, if it wasn’t cast from your hand, each opponent discards a card.
Undercover [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. When it dies while face down, exile it face down without revealing it and put a cover counter on it. Players may look at and cast face down cards they own exiled with cover counters.)[/i]
